titles.title: HIRE Now Tax Cut Extension Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the payroll tax relief under the HIRE Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/10/2010--Introduced. HIRE Now Tax Cut Extension Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend until June 30, 2011, the exemption from payment of employment taxes for individuals who begin employment after July 22, 2010.
